channel.title: How do I make an interface pop up?
channel.description: Ok, on most servers when you do ::commands it pops up an interface with a list of commands but my server doesn't have that and I want to know how to do that

item.title: How do I make an interface pop up?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

setInterfaceWalkable(ID);

Here is a command you can test interfaces with:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“interface”)) {
try {
int testID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(10));

			setInterfaceWalkable(testID);
			sendMessage("Testing Interface: ["+testID+"].");

		} catch(Exception e) {
			sendMessage("You have entered an invalid interface id, try again.");
	}
}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make an interface pop up?
